original_text: And Mattithiah, one of the Levites, who was the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite, had the set office over the things that were made in the pans.
korean_text: 고라 자손 살룸의 맏아들 맛디댜라 하는 레위 사람은 전병을 굽는 일을 맡았으며

sentences.original_text: And Mattithiah, one of the Levites,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 레위 사람 중 하나인 마띠디야는,

sentences.original_text: who was the firstborn of Shallum
over the things that were made in the pans.
